links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 636
maple: spec := [S,{S=Prod(Z,Sequence(Z),Sequence(Prod(Z,Z,Z)))},labeled]: seq(combstruct[count](spec,size=n), n=0..20);restart: G(x):=x/(1-x)/(1-x^3): f[0]:=G(x): for n from 1 to 19 do f[n]:=diff(f[n-1],x) od: x:=0: seq(f[n],n=0..19);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 03 2009]
author: encyclopedia(AT)pommard.inria.fr, Jan 25 2000
